thread.title: Eagle With A GoPro Takes The Alpine Flight Of His Life
thread.title_full: Eagle With A GoPro Takes The Alpine Flight Of His Life

author: Suzy Strutner
title: Eagle With A GoPro Takes The Alpine Flight Of His Life
text: Eagle With A GoPro Takes The Alpine Flight Of His Life He wasn't flying economy class. Suzy Strutner Associate Lifestyle Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/02/2015 04:22 PM EDT This eagle took the flight of his life over the French Alps, but not before some brilliant humans had the idea to strap a GoPro to his back. Footage from the journey resurfaced on Imgur this week, after causing a stir when it debuted in 2013. This footage is a couple years old and I'm not sure if it's made the rounds on here before (searched, couldn't find it). So in case you haven't seen it, enjoy the view!sauce: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G3QrhdfLCO8&feature=youtu.be The eagle's epic adventure comes from Freedom , a conservation movement to protect birds of prey. The charity has also sent eagles on journeys around Dubai and Paris to raise awareness about the species. Watch the video below for this bird's entire trip through the mountains. Meanwhile, a helicopter tour is the closest we earthlings will ever get to eagle-eyed tourism. First stop? The Grand Canyon ... Also on HuffPost:
